name: Education Law
message: I am very determined for give my client full of service.
duties: Ensuring the student is safe while getting an education
Seeing that the student is not subjected to improper discipline
Making certain the students civil rights are not violated
Monitoring school governance, including student records, school rules and regulations, and employment matters

Handling special education issues, such as a student not receiving an appropriate education for their abilities. For example, the school may not be accommodating your child needs — or your needs, if you in college — with curriculum changes and equipment.
